A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Do not waste your money. If you are a fan of the entire star wars franchise\, then this movie will only disappoint you. The only hope I had going in was that this movie be better than that steaming pile \"The Force Awakens.\" Sadly this movie couldn't even live up to that low of a standard. I will not be seeing episode IS\, and I encourage all of you to do the same so Disney sees that they can't churn out crap and get rewarded.
